name: Aura Shift (itch)
description:
Aura Shift is an arcade style high score game. You will face off against waves of enemies, that increase in both difficulty and variety as time passes. 

In Aura Shift you will need to move quickly and precisely, as you change color to attack enemies, and avoid damage. Utilizing power ups will allow you to more quickly destroy monsters, and help you stay alive.

Features:
  • A mouse based movement system that allows skilled players to move their character with speed and precision.
  • Twelve unique enemies types.
  • Six different power ups.
  • Twenty four waves of combat that slowly increase in difficulty, followed by endless waves of rapidly increasing difficulty.
  • A combo driven score system that rewards skilled play and tracks the player's all time best score.
  • Adjustable difficulty, that helps ease new players into the game and rewards skilled players with more opportunities to increase their score.


Minimum Requirements

A mouse.

Windows 7, 8, 8.1 or 10.

200+ MB of hard drive space

250+ MB of RAM (More is recommended).

A somewhat modern CPU and GPU.
